intro: Dorstenia asteriscus, commonly known as the star cluster plant, is a unique member of the family Rubiaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of Central and South America, where it thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its distinctive, star-like inflorescence composed of small, clustered flowers. Its leaves are typically heart-shaped and covered in a dense layer of fine, white hairs. Dorstenia asteriscus is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in suitable conditions.
